about_the_game:
Step into the driver’s seat as a lovable dog in Coco’s Delivery Service. A casual and open-world delivery adventure set in a quirky animal-filled city. Deliver packages, upgrade your van, and uncover a lighthearted mystery involving a shady corporation’s suspicious sardine scheme.

Explore vibrantly pixel art districts, take on the many different delivery challenges, and balance your time between earning cash, sniffing out clues, and interact with the townsfolk.

Make friends, build a business, and solve the mystery!

✨ Wishlist now to stay updated! 

  • Charming exploration: Drive through bustling neighbourhoods filled with quirky animals and vibrant environments.

  • Delivery challenges: Face fun and varied delivery tasks, from timed rush orders to undercover stakeouts.

  • Van customisation and upgrades:  Spend your earnings on new parts for your van to take on new types of deliveries and give it a personal touch.

  • Uncover the mystery: What is actually going beneath the picturesque surface? Piece together clues and investigate a lighthearted conspiracy.

  • Engaging NPCs & Side Quests: Meet quirky characters, get tips, and take on side jobs that bring the city’s personality to life.

Design, code, pixel art: Johan Peitz

Capsule and character artist: Jon Nielsen

Trailer music: Brent Houston

Trailer sfx: zapsplat .com

Marketing coach: Lauren Clare

Work in progress

Coco's Delivery Service is currently in development; videos, screenshots, and gameplay may not be representative of the final product.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: 700 MHz, Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: any card
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any card

name: Coco's Delivery Service

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7
  • Processor: 700 MHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: any card
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any card

short_description: Help Coco start a delivery business and make it big! Join the city's quirky inhabitants in an relaxing adventure with friendships as well as hardships and a little bit of mystery. Make deliveries, meet friends, and uncover the truth.
